title: HOUR 3 - Joe Burrow, Jordan Palmer & Jason McIntyre
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Joe Burrow, Jordan Palmer & Jason McIntyre
description:
In hour 3, Colin compares Joe Burrow to people who have unfair starts in life. The Bengals is a situation that Joe will have to overcome. Jordan Palmer joins the show to talk Joe Burrow, Josh Allen and Dak Prescott. Jason Mcintyre also joins to give his picks on the upcoming slate of NFL games

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
